protocol.text: Seed was collected freshly harvested (H), after 14 days of drying (0 h), 1, 12 and 48 h during stratification and 1, 6, 12, 24, 48 h in continuous light.
80 mg of Arabidopsis thaliana seeds were surface steralised and plated on MS media. Stratification was carried out at 4 °C in darkness, light conditions were 100 µE m -2 sec-1 at 22 °C.
RNA isolation was carried out using the Ambion Plant RNA isolation aid and RNAqeous RNA isolation kit.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 400 ng total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 12.5 µg of the labelled aRNA was hybridised rotating at 60 rpm, 16 hr at 45 °C on GeneChip ATH1 arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned individually using a GeneChip Scanner 3000

The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. Additionally, GC RMA normalisation was carried out using Partek Genomics Suite.
